description: green pig with prominent snout and two eye openings; ear next to each eye; four slanted lines from top to bottom on right side; five slanted lines on left side; curved tail; four darker green feet; slotted ridge along back; number"7" inscribed on bottom; short slanted line eye to bottom on right side; curved line by front left leg; coin slot left side
object_name: Pig with ridge on back (or "Fish-Pig") still bank
title: Pig with ridge on back (or "Fish-Pig") still bank
